column5: My place is close to Downtown, Minute Maid Park, BBVA Compass Stadium, George R. Brown Convention Center, Toyota Center, Discovery Green, bars, parks, bike trails, breweries, street art, & great food. 5 to 10 minutes drive to Downtown and Midtown. Free and easy parking on our street. Hobby airport is 20 mins away and IAH is 25 mins away.  Room is located in the 1st floor with access to a private bathroom and a gated patio.
